duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver safe patient care using the nursing process of assessment, planning, implementation, and evaluation.
Provide direct patient care within the scope of practice.
Guide patient/family teaching and activities of other nursing personnel while maintaining standards of care in the Med/Surg/Telemetry Unit.
Communicate with physicians about changes in the patient’s clinical condition, including cardiac monitoring, results of diagnostic studies, and symptomatology.
Respond quickly and accurately to changes in condition and/or response to treatment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science in Nursing (BSN) required
